hero.name: Mohamed Abdirahman
hero.heading: Hay! I’m Mohamed
hero.description: I love continuous learning, exploring new ideas, and working on projects that combine creativity and challenge. I find joy in self-development and turning ideas into tangible achievements that add value to life.

about.title: I AM AVAILABLE TO WORK WITH YOU
about.description: Hello! I'm Mohammed Abdirahman. I'm a software engineer, web developer, and graphic designer. I work passionately and diligently in the fields of development and design. With years of experience in these areas, I have acquired the skills and knowledge necessary to make your project successful. I enjoy every step of the design and development process, from discussion and collaboration to implementation.

details.title: Website for rentaling cares or buying used cares
details.description: Automax is an all-in-one platform that offers car rental services and the option to buy used cars easily and reliably. The site provides a wide range of vehicles to suit all needs, whether you're looking for an economical car for daily travel or a luxury car for special occasions. It features a user-friendly interface and advanced filtering options to quickly find the perfect car. Users can also view detailed information about used cars, including specifications, history, and overall condition, with the ability to contact the seller directly. [Site Name] ensures a safe and convenient experience, with 24/7 customer support available to meet client needs.

details.title: Ifood
details.description: Ifood is an innovative application designed to provide a comprehensive experience for both restaurants and customers. The app allows restaurants to manage orders easily, from receiving online orders to delivering them quickly and efficiently. Customers can browse the menu, customize their orders, and make secure online payments. Additionally, the app offers home delivery services, allowing customers to track the status of their orders in real-time. The app also helps restaurants improve inventory management and offers promotional deals to increase customer engagement. With an easy-to-use interface and 24/7 customer support, it ensures a seamless experience for all users.

allExperience.companyDescription: A company specialized in selling or renting used cars.
.A company that provide food and delivring service

Hormuud Telecom is one of Somalia's leading telecommunications companies, founded in 2002. It provides a wide range of services, including mobile voice, data, and internet services, with a focus on enhancing digital connectivity in the country. Hormuud is also renowned for its mobile money platform, EVC Plus, which facilitates secure mobile payments, money transfers, and remittances, playing a crucial role in Somalia's cashless economy. The company has been instrumental in bringing reliable communication infrastructure to the region, offering services to millions of customers across Somalia, despite challenges posed by limited infrastructure and a rapidly evolving market.
